86088.affected_area: Nelson (Crescent Bay, Fairview, Harrop, Sunshine Bay, & Willow Point)
86088.summary: Some customers in the Crescent Bay, Fairview, Harrop, Sunshine Bay, & Willow Point areas of Nelson are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
86088.title: Jan 15 - Nelson (Crescent Bay, Fairview, Harrop, Sunshine Bay, & Willow Point) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
